CustomField.formula: IF (TEXT (Reviewed_within_allotted_time__c) = "Burn",10,0) + IF (TEXT ( Setup_Reviewed_Differences_Noted__c ) = "Burn",15,0) + IF (TEXT ( Class_Description_Correct__c ) = "Burn",5,0) + IF (TEXT ( Benefit_and_GI_Amount_Correct__c ) = "Burn",10,0) + IF (TEXT ( Pre_EX_Correct__c ) = "Burn",5,0) + IF (TEXT ( EP_and_Duration_Correct__c ) = "Burn",10,0) + IF (TEXT ( Offsets_Correct__c ) = "Burn",5,0) + IF (TEXT ( Riders_Special_Provisions_Correct__c ) = "Burn",5,0) + IF (TEXT ( Reductions_Correct__c ) = "Burn",5,0) + IF (TEXT ( Formatting_of_Summary_Looks_Presentable__c ) = "Burn",5,0) + IF (TEXT ( Rate_Sheet_Correct__c ) = "Burn",15,0) + IF (TEXT ( Correct_Pay_Period__c ) = "Burn",10,0) + IF (TEXT ( Correct_Spouse_Rates_for_Voluntary__c ) = "Burn",15,0) + IF (TEXT ( Correct_GI_Included_on_RS__c ) = "Burn",5,0) + IF (TEXT ( Correct_Plan_Type__c ) = "Burn",5,0) + IF (TEXT ( Correct_Rounding__c ) = "Burn",5,0) + IF (TEXT ( Format_of_Rate_Sheet_Looks_Presentable__c ) = "Burn",5,0) + IF (TEXT ( Provided_to_Customer_Timely_Manner__c) = "Burn",10,0)+ IF (TEXT ( Salesforce_Setup_and_System_Note__c ) = "Burn",15,0)
CustomField.label: Benefit Summary Points From Burn
